amendment.description: An amendment numbered 6 printed in Part C of House Report 117-125 to provide for U.S. Virgin Islands nonimmigrant visitor visa waivers (as currently provided for Guam and the Northern Mariana Islands) for stays of up to 45 days in the U.S. Virgin Islands.
amendment.purpose: Amendment to provide for U.S. Virgin Islands nonimmigrant visitor visa waivers (as currently provided for Guam and the Northern Mariana Islands) for stays of up to 45 days in the U.S. Virgin Islands.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Plaskett amendment (A003) Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 235 - 190 (Roll no. 270).

action.text: The previous question was ordered on the amendment (A003) pursuant to the rule.
Roll call votes on amendments in House
